text: so it's too bad it didn't get this one
on camera just a few minutes ago someone
posted a comment on the video asking me
how I was going to safely depressurize
the chamber and I figured out it's easy
I'll just slowly loosen a few of these
bolts and let the pressure leak out well
that didn't happen actually it um I
loosened the bolts until the o-ring
started to come loose and then it
cloud of liquid carbon dioxide out of
here and actually hit me in the chest
but luckily it really didn't hurt that
much and I'm fine so but the next order
of business here we'll be adding a valve
